input.sentences: i went shopping in location location today .
the buildings all looked very similar .
my favorite store on the street did n't even have a sign .
i realized i was shopping on a campus and not downtown .
and as soon as i realized that i ran right into the universities main student center .
output.sentences: One Saturday, we decided to go shopping at a specific store.
We had a hard time finding the store, because all of the buildings looked similar!
Luckily we knew what street the store was on, so we eventually found it.
When it was time to leave, we got lost again, because we couldn't remember which way we came from!
It wasn't until we saw the Law School that we realized we were in the right area.
